import React from 'react'; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { createOrder } from '../redux/actions/orderAction' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/shared/Message' import CheckOutStep from '../components/shared/CheckoutStep'; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orderCreate = useSelector(state => state.orderCreate) const { loading, success, error } = orderCreate const placeOrderHandler = () =>{} return ( <>

Street#: {cart.shippingAddress.address} {cart.shippingAddress.city},  {cart.shippingAddress.postalcode},  {cart.shippingAddress.country}

{cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items:

{ cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (Ypur Cart is Empty) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, idx) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.price} ))} ) }

Order Summary:

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} shipping ${cart.shippungPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
